Author: garlish13
Text: that happened to my friend. i started opening up to her about my ed and at first she was discouraging me but then it rubbed on her and i was worried for her and blamed myself for it all the time. it still has an effect on her but it’s not as bad as before. i just try to tell her that she’s fine the way she is and kind of try to discourage them and tell them what you’ve seen people say about ed’s and how they’re bad. share the bad consequences of it and try to make them feel good about themselves so they don’t want to. and this might not be helpful for you, but maybe hold off on talking in detail too much about your ed so they don’t get more ideas. eventually you may be able to again but just until you’re sure they aren’t as easily influenced i guess? idk if this helps but it’s what i did. then again i kinda broke up with that friend bc we were all toxic but we are okay now and idk.
